name: In A Ring of Fire
description:
Inspired by The Gunungan on shadow puppet performence. Gunungan which means mountain in javanese, symbolizes life, so every image in it covers the entire universe and its contents from humans to animals and forests and their equipment.


This artwork is part of a charity event to help victims of the natural disaster from Mount Semeru eruption, every sale in the primary market will be 100% donated to the victims, through Sewon NFT Club #Tezos4Semeru
